resources.string: Input cannot be parsed as a number

You are using a test version of %s! This version may be unstable and is primarily intended for feature testing and early access. It is not recommended for long-term use! If you encounter any issues during testing, please report them to us via GitHub and we will address them as soon as possible.
The application crashed unexpectedly. The error details below will help developers improve the app.
JVM aborted due to fatal signal %d.

For details on the cause, please check the log file. If you are unable to resolve the issue yourself, please send the log file to someone who can analyze it. They may be able to help you diagnose and fix the problem. Please do not take a screenshot of the current screen, as screenshots may not provide sufficient information to resolve the issue.
The launcher encountered a serious problem and crashed during startup
The launcher needs to install these files to ensure Minecraft runs properly. They are included in the app and must be extracted first. Click the button below to start extraction and update.
The launcher is extracting these files. Once done, it will automatically enter the main screen. Please wait patiently.
Set a custom background image for the launcher

string: To ensure a smooth installation, the launcher needs to run the installer in the foreground. We\'ll try to start a foreground service to maintain stability, but this requires notification permissions. Could you help us enable notification permissions? This will help prevent installation interruptions!
Installing the game via foreground service
Java 8 Environment (required for Minecraft 1.16 and below)
Lightweight Java Game Library (required by Minecraft)
Failed to get version: %s. Tap to retry.
An exception occurred during the installation of your game:
Unable to retrieve the download link for the main OptiFine file
An exception occurred during installation, exit code: %s
Some files failed to download, possibly due to network issues.
Your game has been successfully installed!
Waiting for user to enter version name
Failed to get search results: %s. Tap to retry.
Failed to retrieve project information: %s. Tap to retry.
Failed to retrieve version list: %s. Tap to retry.
No available game version is currently installed, so the target download location for the asset cannot be determined. Please install a game version first!

Before installation, you need to understand that most modpacks are made for PC, and there\'s a high chance of crashes or other issues when you try to launch them. These problems are often beyond what the launcher can resolve.
You will need to learn the relevant knowledge to try and resolve the issues yourself, or seek help from others.
Note: The launcher developers typically do not handle issues caused by modpacks.
No compatible runtime found. Using selected version\'s runtime.
Are you sure you want to force close and return to the main screen?
The game is running, waiting for the game screen to appear
Forcing the currently running game to close may cause save data corruption or prevent settings from being saved. Avoid this action unless necessary.
The current renderer %s does not support this game version. Continuing to use it may cause rendering errors or crashes! Are you sure you want to proceed?

The current renderer %s can be configured via a config file. Please enable external storage permission for the launcher first, otherwise it will not be able to read and load the renderer\'s configuration!

The current renderer %s can be configured via a config file. Please enable the "Manage All Files" permission for the launcher first, otherwise it will not be able to read and load the renderer\'s configuration!
Fetching skin and saving account info
Your account has been banned for violating the Xbox Community Standards and can no longer be used!
Your account is currently restricted. A guardian has not authorized you to play online games.
Your account has not yet created an Xbox profile. Please go to https://signup.live.com/signup to register.
Your account has not accepted the Xbox Terms of Service.
Your account\'s region is not authorized to use Xbox services. The login attempt has been blocked.
Your account requires proof of age. Please log in at https://login.live.com/login.srf to provide the necessary information.
Your account has reached the playtime limit and has been blocked from logging in.
The birthdate on the account indicates the user is under 18. A guardian must add this account to a family group to continue using it.
Login attempts are too frequent. Please try again later.
The current IP address has been blocked from logging in.
Please create a Minecraft player profile first, then try logging in again!
Minecraft ownership not verified. Purchase it from Mojang\'s official site.
Is this skin Steve (wide arms) or Alex (slim arms)?
The launcher will enable custom skins for offline accounts by automatically generating and loading a resource pack during the game launch process.
However, please note that this method is not compatible with all versions of Minecraft.
Starting from Minecraft 1.19.3, skin types and character models are more specifically distinguished.
Due to current technical limitations, this feature is only guaranteed to work in versions 1.19.2 and earlier!
Are you sure you want to reset the current account\'s skin?
The current Minecraft version does not support skins using the Alex model. If you set the skin of this account to the Alex model, it will appear as the Steve model in-game!
Due to technical limitations, custom skins may not work in this Minecraft version.
Valid usernames only support letters (case-insensitive), numbers, and underscores, with length between 3 and 16 characters.
Otherwise, the game may not run properly.
Invalid usernames: Name@, N ame, name_name_name_name
If you use mods or plugins that remove this restriction, you may continue using this name; otherwise, please rename it!
Please follow the steps below to add your account:
1. Click the "Login" button — the launcher will attempt to retrieve a verification code;\n
2. Enter the code provided by %s on the pop-up webpage and click "Allow access";\n
3. Follow the instructions on the webpage to complete the sign-in process;\n
4. When prompted with "Let this app access your info?", click "Accept";\n
5. When the webpage displays "All done!", the account will be added automatically. Please wait a moment.
If the webpage shows an "Error" message or the account fails to be added, please retry the above steps.\n
Tip: If your network connection is poor, the webpage may load slowly or fail to open. Try using a network proxy and retry.
Device code copied: %s. Complete verification in your browser.
Polling in progress, attempting to obtain token; device code: %s
No role matching the current account was found. Please check on the server you are using to see if this role exists!
Delete Java runtime %s? This cannot be undone!
Java 8 not found. Required for this feature.
Delete this folder? Files will remain, but the launcher will unlink it.
This folder is already managed. You cannot add duplicates.
Encountered a problem while accessing the game directory
Want to install the game to external storage? Please enable external storage permission for the launcher first, or it won\'t be able to install the game to an external directory!
Want to install the game to external storage? Please enable "Manage all files on device" permission for the launcher first, or it won\'t be able to install the game to an external directory!
Want to use an external game path? Please enable external storage permission for the launcher first, or it won\'t be able to access external game files!
Want to use an external game path? Please enable the "Manage all files on device" permission for the launcher first, or it won\'t be able to access external game files!
Do not use vanilla names for modded versions.
Copy this version with isolation enabled. Check \"Copy All Files\" to include resources.
Deleting a version will also delete all files within the "./versions/%s" directory, including important resources such as game saves, resource packs, mods, and more for that version.
If you have enabled version isolation, related files are stored only in this directory, so deleting the version will remove these files;
If version isolation is not enabled, game files are stored in the root directory, and deleting the version will not clean up all related files.
Please be sure to back up important data before proceeding and delete with caution!
The current version is missing its JSON file or is not in a valid format, so it has been marked as invalid. Therefore, you cannot select this version. Click OK to delete this faulty version.
The launcher will check the installed game files, compare them with the game files required by existing versions, and then delete unused game files. This can save a lot of space on your device.
Note: The launcher will only scan the following folders in the current game directory:
Collect game files required by all versions
An exception occurred while cleaning up game files!
The following files could not be cleaned up due to unknown reasons:
Are you sure you want to reset the icon for the current version?
Isolate the current version so that its data does not interfere with any other versions
Specify the Java environment used by the current version
Enter the server IP here to auto-join after launching the game (e.g., 114.514.114.514:114514)
Enable the control proxy prepared for the Touch Controller mod
Set the vibration duration required by the Touch Controller mod
Leave blank to use global settings
Are you sure you want to delete the mod %s? This action cannot be undone!
Are you sure you want to delete the save file %s? This action cannot be undone!
A resource pack with this name already exists
Are you sure you want to delete the resource pack %s? This action cannot be undone!
No resource packs available for the current version
A shader pack with this name already exists
Are you sure you want to delete the shader pack %s? This action cannot be undone!
No shader packs for this version
An error occurred while downloading Minecraft
Before this, the launcher had already attempted a retry once, but some tasks still failed to download
Some dependency files could not be downloaded. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, the game may be missing required library files. It is recommended to reinstall the game.
The global default renderer uses a dynamic library translation layer to ensure the game runs smoothly on mobile devices
Lower values improve performance; higher values enhance graphics quality. Adjust according to your needs
Enable fullscreen mode, ignoring safe areas like notches and punch-holes
When enabled, the system provides more stable performance for the game, suitable for long play sessions, but may slightly reduce device responsiveness to prevent overheating
Output the converted shader code during game runtime to a log file for easier debugging and graphics rendering analysis

When enabled, the launcher will force the use of the system\'s built-in Vulkan driver (for Adreno GPUs) instead of the default Turnip driver. This setting only affects the Zink backend and related mods that use Vulkan rendering
The launcher detected your device has an Adreno GPU. Enabling this option may cause the Zink renderer to malfunction. Are you sure you want to enable it?
Enable vertical sync for the Zink renderer via the system interface
Bind Minecraft\'s rendering thread to the CPU\'s high-performance cores (big cores). Enabling this may increase power consumption and heat
Isolates all versions so that their data does not interfere with each other
When launching the game, existing game files will not be re-downloaded even if they do not match the actual files

Custom info is shown at the bottom-left of the main menu and top-left of the F3 debug screen. It may not work for special versions or external account logins. You can add the [zl_version] tag, which will be replaced with the current version number automatically
When Java is required, the launcher will automatically select the appropriate environment. If unable to determine, it will use the default Java environment
Specify the default Java environment to use
Additional JVM arguments added when starting the JVM. Modifying these without proper knowledge is not recommended, as it may cause crashes
Automatically show logs before the game officially renders the screen
Adjust the text size on the log screen
Set how often the log buffer refreshes. Refreshing too frequently or too infrequently may affect performance
Click to bind a key for invoking the input method during gameplay
When a physical mouse is connected, disable the virtual mouse pointer and use the system mouse pointer for control

If your device interprets physical mouse right-click as "Back" or middle-click as "Home", you can go to System Settings > Developer Options and enable "Disable Permission Monitoring", this will likely resolve the issue.
In some situations, you may want to hide the virtual mouse; this setting does not affect physical mouse control or swipe control
Adjust the movement speed of the virtual mouse in normal mode
Adjust the sensitivity of mouse movement when captured, such as sensitivity for moving the game view
Choose the virtual mouse control method: swipe the screen to move the cursor, or tap the screen to specify the cursor position
Customize the virtual mouse pointer image to suit your personal preferences
Set the delay time for recognizing a long press on the screen (does not affect physical mouse long presses, even when physical mouse control is disabled)
Supports interactions in-game through gestures like tap and long press, similar to the Bedrock Edition
Select the mouse button action to trigger on a screen tap
Select the mouse button action to trigger on a long press of the screen
Make the launcher pages fullscreen, ignoring safe areas like notches and punch-holes
Adjust the playback speed multiplier for launcher animations
Adjust the intensity of the launcher animations
Choose the page transition animation that best suits your preferences
Set how many days launcher logs should be retained. Logs older than this will be automatically deleted
Tap to share the launcher log files, so developers can identify and fix issues with the launcher
Press the key you want to bind on your keyboard
%s uses the launch backend from PojavLauncher
%s references parts of the implementation from PCL2
%s incorporates code from FCL and references parts of its implementation
%s incorporates code from HMCL and references parts of its implementation
%s uses Simplified Chinese translations of mods and modpacks from MCMod
%s uses the BMCL API mirror source
